name: IMinecartCollisionHandler
description: This class defines a replacement for the default minecart collision code. Only one handler can be registered at a time. It it registered with AbstractMinecartEntity.registerCollisionHandler(). If you use this, make it a configuration option.

methods.name: onEntityCollision
methods.description: This basically replaces the function of the same name in EntityMinecart. Code in IMinecartHooks.applyEntityCollisionHook is still run.

methods.name: getCollisionBox
methods.description: This function replaced the function of the same name in EntityMinecart. It is used to define whether minecarts collide with specific entities, for example items.

methods.name: getMinecartCollisionBox
methods.description: This function is used to define the box used for detecting minecart collisions. It is generally bigger that the normal collision box.

methods.name: getBoundingBox
methods.description: This function replaces the function of the same name in EntityMinecart. It defines whether minecarts are solid to the player.
